metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8711 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple integer overflows in epan/dissectors/packet-amqp.c in the AMQPdissector in Wireshark 1.10.x before 1.10.11 and 1.12.x before 1.12.2 allowremote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via acrafted amqp_0_10 PDU in a packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8711` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
libwireshark11 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
libwiretap8 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
libwscodecs2 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
libwsutil9 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
tshark - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
wireshark - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
wireshark-common - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
wireshark-gtk - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
wireshark-qt - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1').
